DOC.brief_summary: This study aim explore effect Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) breast cancer-related lymphedema utilized conjunction Complex Decongestive Therapy ( CDT ) compare CDT treatment alone . The investigator hypothesize addition LLLT CDT result statistically significant improvement great long-term benefit measure change arm volume girth , pain level , tissue texture , symptom experience , quality life compare benefit CDT alone treatment breast cancer-related lymphedema .
DOC.brief_title: LLLT Combined With CDT Breast Cancer-Related Lymphedema
DOC.criteria: unilateral breast cancer ipsilateral lumpectomy mastectomy lymph node dissection ( sentinel biopsy axillary dissection ) stage II III unilateral secondary upper extremity lymphedema ( defined International Society Lymphology ) girth ≥ 2 cm circumferential difference and/or volume ≥ 200 mL compare uninvolved upper extremity 4 cm segment able commit long term followup schedule active cancer/metastatic cancer currently receive plan adjuvant radiation chemotherapy pregnant presence extremity lymphedema ( primary secondary ) pacemaker artificial joint upper quadrant renal failure arterial insufficiency congestive heart failure chronic inflammatory condition history deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) lymphedematous upper extremity previous treatment Low Level Laser ( regardless indication ) medication ( ) know affect body fluid balance body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 ( morbid obesity )
DOC.keyword: Lymphedema , Low Level Laser , Breast Cancer
